data.message: This stuff tastes awful. I can't find the real cherry coke in my local shops other than the occasional 500ml bottle. Have you stopped making it?

replies.message: Hey Natalie, we're sorry that you dislike the taste. Coke Zero Cherry is now known as Coca-Cola Zero Sugar Cherry. It has a new and improved recipe to taste more like Coca-Cola Cherry but without the sugar. If you're struggling to find a product, we'd recommend speaking to the Grocery Manager in stores near you. Thanks
